title: KAMALAS INVASION: Trainloads of Venezuelans Swarm Town at US-Mexico Border
text: Results 1 to 1 of 1 Thread Information Users Browsing this Thread There are currently 1 users browsing this thread. (0 members and 1 guests) - 09-26-2024, 02:14 PM [#1](https://www.alipac.us/f12/kamala%92s-invasion-trainloads-venezuelans-swarm-town-us-mexico-border-423603/#post1762486)KAMALAS INVASION: Trainloads of Venezuelans Swarm Town at US-Mexico Border KAMALA’S INVASION: Trainloads of Venezuelans Swarm Town at US-Mexico Border - : Efraín González | Border Hawk SHARE: In late summer of 2023, Border Hawk was[first to warn](https://x.com/BorderHawkNews/status/1702670810320654446)about an unprecedented surge of Venezuelan migrants arriving by train to Piedras Negras, which served as a staging ground for the months-long Siege of Eagle Pass, TX. Thousands of illegals began crossing the Rio Grande on a daily basis. Now many of those Venezuelans – including Tren de Aragua gangbangers – are wreaking havoc across the U.S. This example is just one of many that showcases the abject failure of Border Czar Kamala Harris to secure our frontiers and enforce common sense immigration policies that benefit and protect American citizens. VIDEO AT LINK...
